# Halt Deathless (Spell)
## Overview
[[Necromancy Spells|Necromancy]]

**Level:** [[Deathless (Domain)|Deathless 3]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 6th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 6]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, DF

**Range:** Medium (100 ft. + 10 ft./level)

**Targets:** Up to three deathless, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart

**Duration:** 1 round/level

**Saving Throw:** Will negates

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Eberron Campaign Setting (WotC), pg. 111

This spell renders up to three deathless creatures immobile. If the spell is successful, it renders the deathless paralyzed for the duration of the spell (similar to the effect of *[[Hold Person (Spell)|hold person]]* on a living creature). The effect is broken if the *halted* creatures are attacked or take damage.
